extension.summary: Focus only on real video folders
extension.description: This Kodi add-on provides easy browsing of a (local) folder hierarchy of videos by hiding the folders having no videos and showing folders with one only video as if they were video files
extension.disclaimer: You must set the root of the tree before using this plugin
extension.news: You can now configure this add-on to use regular expressions for hiding order numbers in folder names (often used to ensure a particular order for a set of subfolders)
